bill.summary:
DHS Intelligence and Analysis Oversight and Transparency Act
This bill requires the Office of Intelligence and Analysis (I&A) in the Department of Homeland Security to conduct an annual audit of I&A's information systems and bulk data, in a manner consistent with I&A's intelligence oversight guidelines. I&A must provide the findings and results of such audits to Congress.
